generated.css: body{font-family:system-ui,-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,Segoe UI,Roboto,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,Open Sans,Helvetica Neue,sans-serif;margin:0;padding:0;background-color:#f5f5f5}.header{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;right:0;background-color:#66c0ec;width:100%;height:5.5rem;display:flex;align-items:center}.header__content{font-family:Paytone One,sans-serif;text-align:left;font-size:3.5rem;margin:0 0 0 .5rem;color:#000}.sidebar{position:fixed;background-color:#66c0ec;display:flex;flex-direction:row;height:calc(100vh - 5.5rem);top:5.5rem;width:5rem;transition:width .5s;overflow:hidden;margin-top:-.5rem;z-index:2}.sidebar:hover{position:absolute;width:15rem;z-index:2}.sidebar__list{padding:0}.sidebar__selection{display:flex;align-items:center;padding:1.6rem 0;font-size:1.4rem;color:#000;transition:width .5s;font-weight:600}.sidebar__selection:hover{background-color:#789;min-width:15rem}.sidebar__icon{width:4rem;text-align:center;margin-right:1rem;margin-left:.3rem;font-size:2rem}.sidebar__text{text-decoration:none;color:inherit}.active--link{color:#00008b}html{font-size:62.5%;margin:0;padding:0}.main__block{position:absolute;top:6.5rem;left:6.5rem;right:0;bottom:0;overflow-y:scroll;height:calc(100vh - 6.5rem)}.content__block{display:flex;gap:20px;margin:15px 0}.table__container{width:85vh;height:85vh;background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,.5);display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:flex-start;align-items:center;border-radius:10px}.table__title{margin-top:10px;font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:700;color:#000}.collapsible__block{display:flex;width:100%;gap:20px}.collapsible__container{position:relative;border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2);border-radius:10px;display:flex;max-width:20rem;max-height:7.5rem;background-color:#fff}.collapsible__header{display:flex;flex-direction:column;padding:5px 20px 0;white-space:nowrap}.collapsible__heading{margin:0;font-size:1.2rem;color:#000}.collapsible__chevron{transition:transform .3s;transform:rotate(180deg)}.collapsible--expanded .collapsible__chevron{transform:rotate(0)}.collapsible__selection{font-size:1.4rem;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;pointer-events:auto;max-width:20rem;min-width:15rem;color:#000}.collapsible__selection:before{content:"";position:absolute;bottom:10px;left:15px;right:15px;height:1px;background-color:#000}.collapsible--expanded .collapsible__content{max-height:40vh;opacity:1;pointer-events:auto;z-index:1;color:#000}.collapsible__content{list-style:none;background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2);opacity:0;transition:all .3s;font-size:1.4rem;border-radius:5px;margin:.5rem 1rem 0;overflow-y:auto}.collapsible__content,.collapsible__list{position:relative;padding:5px}.collapsible__list:hover:before{content:"";position:absolute;top:0;right:-6px;bottom:0;left:-6px;background-color:#d3d3d3;z-index:-1}.map__container{width:85vh;height:85vh;background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #ccc;box-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,.5);display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:flex-start;align-items:center;border-radius:10px}.map__title{margin-top:10px;font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:700;min-width:350px;color:#000}.map{width:95%;height:92%;border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:5px;z-index:0}.chart__container{width:75vh;height:45vh;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:flex-start;border-radius:10px;border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:5px}.chart__container,.chart__container__bottom{background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,.5);align-items:center;margin:20px}.chart__container__bottom{position:relative;justify-content:center;width:100vh;height:65vh;border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:10px}.top__section{display:flex;justify-content:flex-start;align-items:center}.line__chart{width:70vh;height:38vh}.pie__chart{width:60vh;height:35vh}.weather__chart{width:140vh;height:38vh}.section__header{margin-bottom:20px;color:#333;font-size:20px;font-weight:700;text-align:center}
